scripts.preview:local: npm run build:local && vite preview --port 4173 --outDir dist-local
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && vite preview --port 4173 --outDir dist-prod
scripts.production: npm run build:prod && vite preview --port 4173 --outDir dist-prod
scripts.serve:local: mkdir -p dist-local && (ls dist-local/index.html > /dev/null 2>&1 || npm run build:local) && vite preview --port 4173 --outDir dist-local
scripts.serve:prod: mkdir -p dist-prod && (ls dist-prod/index.html > /dev/null 2>&1 || npm run build:prod) && vite preview --port 4173 --outDir dist-prod
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && echo 'Ready for GitHub Pages deployment from dist-prod/'
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean:local: npm run clean && npm run build:local
scripts.clean:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:prod
